definitions: To make beer, ale, or other alcoholic drinks by steeping, boiling, and fermentation.
To make tea or coffee by infusing leaves or grounds in hot water.
To prepare a drink or mixture.
To begin to develop; to form or gather.
examples: They brew their own beer at home.
She will brew a fresh pot of coffee.
Trouble was brewing between the two factions.
The storm began to brew offshore.
